entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this morning then 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 07:41 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 07:41 AM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
